items.sentence: Do you believe Tom\'s accusations against Mary?
I don\'t think I\'ll make it to school on time.
I don\'t think Tom can hear what we\'re saying.
Tom\'s car is parked in the middle of the road.
Tom eats like a pig and he looks like one, too.
You\'re going to Boston next week, aren\'t you?
You\'re in love with someone else, aren\'t you?
You\'re just the person I\'ve been looking for.
Tom bought a new camera so he sold his old one.
Tom closed his eyes and pretended to be asleep.
